20CAST_ACCESSOR(InstructionStream)
21OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS_IMPL(InstructionStream, TrustedObject)
22NEVER_READ_ONLY_SPACE_IMPL(InstructionStream)
23
24uint32_t InstructionStream::body_size() const {
25 return ReadField<uint32_t>(kBodySizeOffset);
26}
27
28// TODO(sroettger): remove unused setter functions once all code writes go
29// through the WritableJitAllocation, e.g. the body_size setter above.
30
31#if V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL
32Address InstructionStream::constant_pool() const {
33 return address() + ReadField<int>(kConstantPoolOffsetOffset);
34}
35#else
36Address InstructionStream::constant_pool() const { return kNullAddress; }
37#endif
38
39// static
40Tagged<InstructionStream> InstructionStream::Initialize(
41 Tagged<HeapObject> self, Tagged<Map> map, uint32_t body_size,
42 int constant_pool_offset, Tagged<TrustedByteArray> reloc_info) {
43 {
44 WritableJitAllocation writable_allocation =
45 ThreadIsolation::RegisterInstructionStreamAllocation(
46 self.address(), InstructionStream::SizeFor(body_size));
47 CHECK_EQ(InstructionStream::SizeFor(body_size), writable_allocation.size());
48
49 writable_allocation.WriteHeaderSlot<Map, kMapOffset>(map, kRelaxedStore);
50
51 writable_allocation.WriteHeaderSlot<uint32_t, kBodySizeOffset>(body_size);
52
53 if constexpr (V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL) {
54 writable_allocation.WriteHeaderSlot<int, kConstantPoolOffsetOffset>(
55 kHeaderSize + constant_pool_offset);
56 }
57
58 // During the Code initialization process, InstructionStream::code is
59 // briefly unset (the Code object has not been allocated yet). In this state
60 // it is only visible through heap iteration.
61 writable_allocation.WriteHeaderSlot<Smi, kCodeOffset>(Smi::zero(),
62 kReleaseStore);
63
64 DCHECK(!ObjectInYoungGeneration(reloc_info));
65 writable_allocation.WriteProtectedPointerHeaderSlot<TrustedByteArray,
66 kRelocationInfoOffset>(
67 reloc_info, kRelaxedStore);
68
69 // Clear header padding
70 writable_allocation.ClearBytes(kUnalignedSize,
71 kHeaderSize - kUnalignedSize);
72 // Clear trailing padding.
73 writable_allocation.ClearBytes(kHeaderSize + body_size,
74 TrailingPaddingSizeFor(body_size));
75 }
76
77 Tagged<InstructionStream> istream = InstructionStream::cast(self);
78
79 // We want to keep the code minimal that runs with write access to a JIT
80 // allocation, so trigger the write barriers after the WritableJitAllocation
81 // went out of scope.
82 SLOW_DCHECK(!WriteBarrier::IsRequired(istream, map));
83 CONDITIONAL_PROTECTED_POINTER_WRITE_BARRIER(*istream, kRelocationInfoOffset,
84 reloc_info, UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER);
85
86 return istream;
87}
88
89// Copy from compilation artifacts stored in CodeDesc to the target on-heap
90// objects.
91//
92// Note this is quite convoluted for historical reasons. The CodeDesc buffer
93// contains instructions, a part of inline metadata, and the relocation info.
94// Additionally, the unwinding_info is stored in a separate buffer
95// `desc.unwinding_info`. In this method, we copy all these parts into the
96// final on-heap representation.
97//
98// The off-heap representation:
99//
100// CodeDesc.buffer:
101//
102// +-------------------
103// | instructions
104// +-------------------
105// | inline metadata
106// | .. safepoint table
107// | .. handler table
108// | .. constant pool
109// | .. code comments
110// +-------------------
111// | reloc info
112// +-------------------
113//
114// CodeDesc.unwinding_info: .. the unwinding info.
115//
116// This is transformed into the on-heap representation, where
117// InstructionStream contains all instructions and inline metadata, and a
118// pointer to the relocation info byte array.
119void InstructionStream::Finalize(Tagged<Code> code,
120 Tagged<TrustedByteArray> reloc_info,
121 CodeDesc desc, Heap* heap) {
122 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
123 base::Optional<WriteBarrierPromise> promise;
124
125 // Copy the relocation info first before we unlock the Jit allocation.
126 // TODO(sroettger): reloc info should live in protected memory.
127 DCHECK_EQ(reloc_info->length(), desc.reloc_size);
128 CopyBytes(reloc_info->begin(), desc.buffer + desc.reloc_offset,
129 static_cast<size_t>(desc.reloc_size));
130
131 {
132 WritableJitAllocation writable_allocation =
133 ThreadIsolation::LookupJitAllocation(
134 address(), InstructionStream::SizeFor(body_size()),
135 ThreadIsolation::JitAllocationType::kInstructionStream);
136
137 // Copy code and inline metadata.
138 static_assert(InstructionStream::kOnHeapBodyIsContiguous);
139 writable_allocation.CopyCode(kHeaderSize, desc.buffer,
140 static_cast<size_t>(desc.instr_size));
141 writable_allocation.CopyData(kHeaderSize + desc.instr_size,
142 desc.unwinding_info,
143 static_cast<size_t>(desc.unwinding_info_size));
144 DCHECK_EQ(desc.body_size(), desc.instr_size + desc.unwinding_info_size);
145 DCHECK_EQ(code->body_size(),
146 code->instruction_size() + code->metadata_size());
147
148 promise.emplace(RelocateFromDesc(writable_allocation, heap, desc,
149 code->constant_pool(), no_gc));
150
151 // Publish the code pointer after the istream has been fully initialized.
152 // TODO(sroettger): this write should go through writable_allocation. At
153 // this point, set_code could probably be removed entirely.
154 set_code(code, kReleaseStore);
155 }
156
157 // Trigger the write barriers after we dropped the JIT write permissions.
158 RelocateFromDescWriteBarriers(heap, desc, code->constant_pool(), *promise,
159 no_gc);
160 CONDITIONAL_PROTECTED_POINTER_WRITE_BARRIER(*this, kCodeOffset, code,
161 UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER);
162
163 code->FlushICache();
164}
165
166bool InstructionStream::IsFullyInitialized() {
167 return raw_code(kAcquireLoad) != Smi::zero();
168}
169
170Address InstructionStream::body_end() const {
171 static_assert(kOnHeapBodyIsContiguous);
172 return instruction_start() + body_size();
173}
174
175Tagged<Object> InstructionStream::raw_code(AcquireLoadTag tag) const {
176 Tagged<Object> value = RawProtectedPointerField(kCodeOffset).Acquire_Load();
177 DCHECK(!ObjectInYoungGeneration(value));
178 DCHECK(IsSmi(value) || IsTrustedSpaceObject(HeapObject::cast(value)));
179 return value;
180}
181
182Tagged<Code> InstructionStream::code(AcquireLoadTag tag) const {
183 return Code::cast(raw_code(tag));
184}
185
186void InstructionStream::set_code(Tagged<Code> value, ReleaseStoreTag tag) {
187 DCHECK(!ObjectInYoungGeneration(value));
188 DCHECK(IsTrustedSpaceObject(value));
189 WriteProtectedPointerField(kCodeOffset, value, tag);
190 CONDITIONAL_PROTECTED_POINTER_WRITE_BARRIER(*this, kCodeOffset, value,
191 UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER);
192}
193
194bool InstructionStream::TryGetCode(Tagged<Code>* code_out,
195 AcquireLoadTag tag) const {
196 Tagged<Object> maybe_code = raw_code(tag);
197 if (maybe_code == Smi::zero()) return false;
198 *code_out = Code::cast(maybe_code);
199 return true;
200}
201
202bool InstructionStream::TryGetCodeUnchecked(Tagged<Code>* code_out,
203 AcquireLoadTag tag) const {
204 Tagged<Object> maybe_code = raw_code(tag);
205 if (maybe_code == Smi::zero()) return false;
206 *code_out = Code::unchecked_cast(maybe_code);
207 return true;
208}
209
210Tagged<TrustedByteArray> InstructionStream::relocation_info() const {
211 return TrustedByteArray::cast(
212 ReadProtectedPointerField(kRelocationInfoOffset));
213}
214
215Address InstructionStream::instruction_start() const {
216 return field_address(kHeaderSize);
217}
218
219Tagged<TrustedByteArray> InstructionStream::unchecked_relocation_info() const {
220 Tagged<Object> value =
221 RawProtectedPointerField(kRelocationInfoOffset).Acquire_Load();
222 return TrustedByteArray::unchecked_cast(value);
223}
224
225uint8_t* InstructionStream::relocation_start() const {
226 return relocation_info()->begin();
227}
228
229uint8_t* InstructionStream::relocation_end() const {
230 return relocation_info()->end();
231}
232
233int InstructionStream::relocation_size() const {
234 return relocation_info()->length();
235}
236
237int InstructionStream::Size() const { return SizeFor(body_size()); }
238
239// static
240Tagged<InstructionStream> InstructionStream::FromTargetAddress(
241 Address address) {
242 {
243 // TODO(jgruber,v8:6666): Support embedded builtins here. We'd need to pass
244 // in the current isolate.
245 Address start =
246 reinterpret_cast<Address>(Isolate::CurrentEmbeddedBlobCode());
247 Address end = start + Isolate::CurrentEmbeddedBlobCodeSize();
248 CHECK(address < start || address >= end);
249 }
250
251 Tagged<HeapObject> code =
252 HeapObject::FromAddress(address - InstructionStream::kHeaderSize);
253 // Unchecked cast because we can't rely on the map currently not being a
254 // forwarding pointer.
255 return InstructionStream::unchecked_cast(code);
256}
257
258// static
259Tagged<InstructionStream> InstructionStream::FromEntryAddress(
260 Address location_of_address) {
261 Address code_entry = base::Memory<Address>(location_of_address);
262 Tagged<HeapObject> code =
263 HeapObject::FromAddress(code_entry - InstructionStream::kHeaderSize);
264 // Unchecked cast because we can't rely on the map currently not being a
265 // forwarding pointer.
266 return InstructionStream::unchecked_cast(code);
267}
268
269// static
270PtrComprCageBase InstructionStream::main_cage_base() {
271#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
272 return PtrComprCageBase{V8HeapCompressionScheme::base()};
273#else
274 return PtrComprCageBase{};
275#endif
276}
277
